| titletext = Which is, coincidentally, the most unsettling mantlepiece decoration in my house.

==Explanation==
This comic follows the previous one about robots, [[595: Android Girlfriend]], where [[Cueball]] showed that he had an android girlfriend [[Megan]]. Now, [[Ponytail]] has decided she would also like to have an {{w|android (robot)|android}} boyfriend ([[Hairy]]). But upon bringing these two androids together, they fall for each other and decide to have "sex" on the spot, resulting in several mechanical sounds off-panel while their "owners" watch on with disgusted interest.

{{w|vibrator (sex toy)|Vibrator}}s and {{w|fleshlight}}s are sex toys that represent male and female genitalia, respectively. Ponytail's flat description indicates that she is not particularly aroused by what amounts to a pair of animatronic sex toys rubbing against each other. [[Randall|Randall's]] title text claims that he has actually done such a thing, and stuck it on his fireplace mantle for all his house-guests to see. He admits though that it is ''the most unsettling mantlepiece decoration in my house.'' References to fleshlights is a [[:Category:Fleshlights|recurring theme]] in xkcd.

==Transcript==
:[Ponytail enters from the right dragging Hairy along by his hand, as she moves towards Cueball who stands with Megan in his hand.]
:Ponytail: I thought your android girlfriend was cool so I got myself an android boyfriend.

:[Suddenly the Megan android runs into the arms of the Hairy android, while Ponytail has let go of his hand. Ponytails head swirls around to follow her run by.]
:Ponytail: He's really great. I like howâ€”
:Ponytail: Uh.

:[Cueball and Ponytail look towards the two androids, but they are now outside this frame-less panel.]
:Off-panel sound: ''*Zip*''
:Off-panel voice: ''Mmmmm''

:[Cueball and Ponytail still look at the scene off panel.]
:Cueball: ...Huh.
:Ponytail: It's like somebody stuck a vibrator in a fleshlight.
:Off-panel sound: ''Whirrr''
:Off-panel voice: ''Mmmm''
:Off-panel sound: ''Click''

==Trivia==
This is the comic six years before [[1541: Voice]], in which Ponytail stated that she could only control her voice once every six years.
